dataList.name: Bloodied Hand II
dataList.desc:
- Any effects that gain Bloodied Hand gain this effect instead
- Max Value: 20
- Base Value: 10
- Gain 1 Offense Level for every 6 Stack

dataList.name: Bloodied Hand III
dataList.desc:
- Any effects that gain Bloodied Hand gain this effect instead
- Max Value: 30
- Base Value: 20
- Gain 1 Attack Power
- At 30 Stack: On Hit with this unit's Skill, inflict additional 2 Rupture and +1 Rupture Count
- At 30 Stack: On Hit with this unit's Skill, inflict 3 Bleed both on self and against the target

dataList.name: Ailing Heart
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 10
- Enters Encounter with 3 Stack
- Turn Start: gain 1 Defense Level Down for every Stack
- Turn Start: gain 1 Offense Level Up for every 2 Stack
- Turn Start: at 10 Stack, gain 3 Fragile and lose 5 SP
- At 10 Stack: On Hit, heal 40% of the damage dealt to this unit's Part and Core, and gain 2 Bloodied Hand

dataList.name: Withered
dataList.desc:
- Starved for blood for a long, long time.
- Lose 25 Base Offense Level
- Lose 25 Base Defense Level

dataList.name: Guilt
dataList.desc: Turn End: gain 1 Fragility and SP Heal Efficiency Down

dataList.name: Guilt
dataList.desc: Turn End: gain 2 Fragility and 1 SP Heal Efficiency Down

dataList.name: SP Heal Efficiency Down
dataList.desc: SP Heal Efficiency decreases by the effect's Stack

dataList.name: Attachment
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 9
- When the Attacker attacks the target with this effect, the Attacker gains Clash Power equal to the Stack
- Turn End: reduce by 1

dataList.name: Faint Memories
dataList.desc:
- Base Value: 10
- Turn Start: gain Defense Level Up equal to the Stack
- Clash Lose: reduce by 1

dataList.name: Box of Curses
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 1
- Turn End: gain 1 Attack Power Down, 1 Defense Power Down, 2 Offense Level Down, 2 Defense Level Down, and reduce the Stack of this effect by 1

dataList.name: Little Carmilla
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- Gain 2 Bleed every time this unit gains Little Carmilla
- Turn End: gain +2 Bleed Count
- Turn End: at 3 Stack, take fixed damage equal to 15% of this unit's max HP, heal HP equal to 5% of each enemy's max HP, then this effect expires

dataList.name: A Drop of Nourishment
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 10
- Gain 1 Stack every time this unit heals 10% of its max HP with its HP-healing Attacks
- HP healed: {0}%

dataList.name: Barbed Lasso
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- Turn End: gain 2 Rupture and +2 Rupture Count
- Turn End: at 1+ Stack, fix this unit's Speed to 1.
- Turn End: at 2 Stack, take 20 Gluttony damage.
- Turn End: at 3 Stack, become forcibly Staggered next turn. This effect and the connected Barbed Lasso both expire.
- Gain 1 at Turn Start

dataList.name: Shimmering【Bloodfiend】
dataList.desc:
- While this effect is active: when this unit takes damage, the Attacker gains 5 Bleed After Attack.
- While this effect is active: the Shield HP does not expire at Turn End
- When conditions are met, gain 3 Fragile until this effect expires and this unit gains a new pattern

dataList.name: Hardblood
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 10
- Stage 1 Hardblood
- Used for special Skills

dataList.name: Hardblood II
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 20
- Stage 2 Hardblood
- Turn Start: gain 1 Offense Level and Defense Level for every 6 Stack
- Raise Min & Max Speed values by 1
- Used for special Skills

dataList.name: Hardblood III
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 30
- Stage 3 Hardblood
- Turn Start: gain 2 Offense Level and Defense Level for every 6 Stack
- Raise Min & Max Speed values by 2
- Used for special Skills

dataList.name: Dreamy Hesitation
dataList.desc:
- Lose 35 Base Offense Level
- Lose 35 Base Defense Level

dataList.name: Resanguination
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
If the target does not have Bleed, Clash Power -1; On Hit, heal HP equal to Bleed Potency on the target

dataList.name: Resanguination
dataList.desc:
- Panic
If the target has Bleed, Clash Power +2; if the target does not have Bleed, Clash Power -2; On Hit, heal HP equal to Bleed Potency on the target

dataList.name: Bloodfeast Consumed (shared)
dataList.desc: Total Bloodfeast consumed in this Encounter

dataList.name: Polydipsic Rose
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 5
- Turn End: at 10+ Bleed Potency, take Lust damage equal to 1% of this unit's max HP. (max 30)
- Turn End: reduced by 1

dataList.name: Rose Wedge
dataList.desc:
- Max Potency: 10
- Max Count: 4
- Gain 1 Potency every time this unit takes 10 Bleed damage
- When gaining Bleed or 'Unique Bleed' from getting hit, gain 2 Bleed and inflict 1 Bleed against the Attacker. (5 times per turn)
· At 10 Potency, gain +1 Bleed Count as well when triggering the above effect.
- Turn End: lose 1 Count
- Combat End: at 10 Potency or 1 Count, this effect expires, and this unit takes (Potency x 10) Lust damage.
- If the unit inflicted with this effect dies, or when this effect expires: increase Bloodfeast by (Potency x 10), and deal (Potency x 2) Lust damage against all of its allies (min 1)

dataList.name: The Endless Wheel
dataList.desc:
Reduced by 1 every time a Gondola is defeated.
If this value is at 0, and if there are no units to be spawned next turn, move on to the next phase.

dataList.name: Starved and Withered
dataList.desc:
- Lose 10 Base Offense Level
- Lose 10 Base Defense Level

dataList.name: Returning Bloodlust
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 10
- Stage 1 Returning Bloodlust

dataList.name: Returning Bloodlust II
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 20
- Stage 2 Returning Bloodlust
- Turn Start: gain 1 Offense Level up and 1 Defense Level Up for every 5 Value
- Clash Power +1 to Skills that consume Returning Bloodlust; inflict +1 more of Potency and Count for Bleed and Rupture inflicted by the said Skill

dataList.name: Returning Bloodlust III
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 30
- Stage 3 Returning Bloodlust
- Turn Start: gain 2 Offense Level up and 1 Defense Level Up for every 5 Value
- Coin Power +1 to Skills that consume Returning Bloodlust; inflict +1 more of Potency and Count for Bleed and Rupture inflicted by the said Skill

dataList.name: Time to abandon my dream...
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Gain 2 Attack Power Up and 1 Fragile; raise max Speed value by 2
- Heal +30% more HP when healing
- Turn End: if the current Returning Bloodlust is lower than its value at Turn Start, gain 2 Offense Level Up and 2 Defense Level Down

dataList.name: ... for my Family, as their Father...
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Gain 2 Attack Power Up, 2 Haste, and 2 Fragile
- Heal +50% more HP when healing
- Turn End: if the current Returning Bloodlust is lower than its value at Turn Start, gain 3 Offense Level Up and 5 Defense Level Down

dataList.name: Irresponsible Dream
dataList.desc: Killed when hit by Don Quixote.

dataList.name: Congealing Blood
dataList.desc: Cannot act for 2 turns; spawns an Impaling Spear unit over the ally.

dataList.name: Crippling Injury
dataList.desc:
- Yet to recover from the wounds gained in the previous battle.
- Massively reduce max HP
- Turn Start: gain 1 Defense Level Down for every cumulative turn (max 15)

dataList.name: IN WHICH IS RECOUNTED THE LIBERATION FROM BLOOD THICKER THAN WATER
dataList.desc:
- At every Turn End: gain 1 Haste and 3 Offense Level Up next turn
- Gain 2 additional Offense Level Up after every 3 cumulative turns (max 6)
- On Clash Win, heal 3 SP
- On Kill, gain 1 Clash Power Up next turn (once per turn)

Gain 2 Attack Power Up at every Turn Start; +2 SP Efficiency

dataList.name: Reawakening Joy Of Carnage

Turn Start: gain 6 Defense Level Up. Gain 3 Offense Level Up next turn
